title: Meditation & Mindfulness
author: Walworth
description: Description: Luke Fortney, MD, Katherine Bonus and Lynn Smith provide an overview of meditation. Katherine Bonus presents an exercise in Mindfulness Meditation and Lynn Smith discusses her Centering Prayer technique.
